metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7208 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: In the coff_pointerize_aux function in coffgen.c in the Binary FileDescriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.30,an index is not validated, which allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service (segmentation fault) or possibly have unspecified other impactvia a crafted file, as demonstrated by objcopy of a COFF object.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
